entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
